privacy.title: Privacy Policy | NettmobInfotech
privacy.description: Privacy policy of NettmobInfotech. Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy.
privacy.keywords: privacy, cookies, user data, security, GDPR

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: NettmobInfotech, located at 10 Rue du Colis√©e, 75008 Paris, France, attaches great importance to the protection of your personal data.
intro.p2: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our services.

collected.title: Data Collected
collected.desc: We collect only the data necessary to provide you with our services and respond to your requests.

purpose.title: Use of Data
purpose.desc: Your data is processed for the following purposes:

legal.title: Legal Basis
legal.desc: The processing of your data is based on:

item1.label: Consent
item1.value: that you give when sending a form.

item3.label: Our legitimate interest
item3.value: in ensuring the proper functioning of our service.

retention.title: Retention
retention.p1: We keep your personal data for the duration necessary to achieve the purposes for which they were collected.
retention.p2: Contact data for prospects are kept for a maximum of 3 years after the last contact. Customer data are kept for the duration of the contractual relationship, increased by legal prescription periods.

security.title: Security
security.desc: We implement rigorous security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access:
security.item1: HTTPS (SSL) protocol on the entire site
security.item3: Restricted data access to authorized persons only

rights_top.title: Your Rights
rights_top.desc: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.title: Access
access.desc: Know what data we hold about you.

erasure.title: Erasure
erasure.desc: Request the deletion of your data.

opposition.title: Opposition
opposition.desc: Object to the processing of your data.

contact.title: Exercise Your Rights
contact.p1: To exercise your rights or for any questions related to the protection of your personal data, you can contact us:
contact.address:
NettmobInfotech - Data Protection
10 Rue du Colis√©e, 75008 Paris, France
contact.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL.

rgpd.title: GDPR & Data Protection | NettmobInfotech
rgpd.description: Our GDPR policy and personal data protection. Full transparency on the processing of your information.
rgpd.keywords: GDPR, data protection, privacy, compliance, personal data, security

hero.title: GDPR & Data Protection
hero.subtitle: Our commitment to the protection of your personal data

what.title: What is GDPR?
what.p1: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulatory text that frames data processing equally throughout the European Union territory.
what.p2: At NettmobInfotech, we consider that the protection of your data is not only a legal obligation, but a guarantee of trust for our users.

rights_detail.title: Your Rights in Detail
rights_detail.desc: In accordance with regulations, you have several rights regarding your personal data.

access.title: Right of Access
access.desc: You can obtain confirmation that your data is being processed and obtain a copy.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.desc: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.desc: You can request the deletion of your data under certain conditions.

limitation.title: Right to Limitation
limitation.desc: You can request the temporary freezing of the use of some of your data.

portability.title: Right to Portability
portability.desc: You can request to retrieve your data to transmit them to another controller.

opposition.title: Right to Object
opposition.desc: You can object at any time to the processing of your data for specific reasons.

legal_basis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legal_basis.desc: We only collect your data if we have a legal basis to do so:

consent.title: Consent
consent.desc: You have given your explicit agreement (e.g., contact form).

contract.title: Execution of a contract
contract.desc: Processing is necessary to provide you with the requested service.

interest.title: Legitimate interest
interest.desc: Processing is necessary for the management of our activity while respecting your rights.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.desc: We keep your data only for the time necessary for the purposes for which they were collected:

clients.label: Clients
clients.value: Duration of the contractual relationship plus 5 years (legal obligations)

security.title: Data Security
security.desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.desc: Use of HTTPS/TLS protocol throughout the site.

access.title: Access Control
access.desc: Restricted access to authorized persons only.

backup.title: Backups
backup.desc: Regular backups to prevent any data loss.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.desc: Continuous monitoring to detect any intrusion.

transfer.title: Data Transfer
transfer.desc: Your personal data are stored on secure servers located in the European Union (France). No transfer outside the EU is carried out without appropriate guarantees.

breach.title: Data Breach
breach.desc: In accordance with Article 33 of the GDPR, in the event of a personal data breach likely to result in a high risk to your rights and freedoms, we will inform you as soon as possible and notify the CNIL within 72 hours.

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights?
exercise.desc: To exercise one of your rights, you can contact us by:

post.label: Postal mail
post.address:
NettmobInfotech - Data Protection Service
10 Rue du Colis√©e
75008 Paris, France

exercise.delay: Response time: We commit to responding to your request within one month of receipt. This period may be extended by two months in case of complexity or a large number of requests.
exercise.id: Supporting documents: For security reasons, we may ask you to prove your identity by providing us with a copy of an identity document.

complaint.title: Right to Lodge a Complaint with the CNIL
complaint.desc: If you feel that your rights are not being respected, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Commission Nationale de l'Informatique and des Libert√©s (CNIL):
